name: Snowfort Siege
description:
Its the first snow of the year and some naughty kids have stolen all your golden bananas! Raid their snow fort to get them back! This game was made for AlphabetX during the Secret Santa Jam 2021. Hope you enjoy it :)

TIC-80 uses this button mapping. Throughout this tutorial we'll use the "Action" button.

ActionKey (QWERTY) Up Up Arrow Down Down Arrow Left Left Arrow Right Right Arrow A Z B X X A Y S

Hold down a direction with the D-Pad and press A to move.

Press X to build a snowball. You can hold up to 3 at a time.Then hold down a direction, and press B to throw one of them! Hitting a baddy with a snowball will eliminate them!

Getting hit by a snowball takes a heart, run out and its game over.

  Collect all 3 golden bananas scattered around the map to win!

Everyone moves at the same time, so plan your moves out carefully.
